Class Rank1Tensor

java.lang.Object
  JSci.physics.relativity.Tensor
      JSci.physics.relativity.Rank1Tensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Member
public class Rank1Tensor
extends Tensor

The Rank1Tensor class encapsulates 1st rank tensors.

See Also:
